arts.ttl: Monaco loses 3-1 at Lorient in Ligue 1 before PSG takes on Auxerre at home
arts.sum: Fati come on midway through the second half but saw Lorient striker Pablo Pagis — whose father Mickaël Pagis played up front for Strasbourg, Marseille and Rennes — scoring two goals. Monaco captain Thilo Kehrer was sent off in the 38th minute after collecting a second yellow card and Lorient scored moments later, with striker Mohamed Bamba turning in a cross from the left.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Watch Paris pre-match live
arts.sum: This Saturday, as part of matchday 6 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face Auxerre (10th) at the Parc des Princes. arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Preview of the Auxerre team: the mission is stability
arts.sum: This Saturday, September 27, Paris Saint-Germain will face Auxerre at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 9:05 PM, CET) for matchday 6 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Luis Enrique’s comments on the Ballon d’Or and the opponent
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, coach of Paris Saint-Germain (2nd), held a press conference this Friday ahead of their match against Auxerre (10th) at the Parc des Princes tomorrow (kick-off at 9:05 PM, CET), for matchday 6 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Alongside this event, the Spaniard also spoke to PSG TV. He discussed the 2025 Ballon […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – The Auxerre squad: 3 players unavailable
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) and Auxerre (10th) will face each other at the Parc des Princes for matchday 6 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 9:05 PM, CET). Here is the squad selected by Auxerre coach Christophe Pélissier for this match. Out – El-Azzouzi, Diomandé (injury), Oppegard (suspension).
